about_the_game:
The product name Season Pass Vol.2 has been changed to Add-on Vol.2.
NOTE: The contents included will not change.

Disclaimer: Maps are not included in the DLC Pack. They're for showcasing materials.
Please note: This pack is included in the RPG Maker MV Season Pass.

The 2nd pack includes some characters from RPG Maker 2000/2003 RTP completely remade for RPG Maker MV. Alex’s party is back to help you create your dream game!

Includes the following materials:

  • Character Walking Graphics + Damage Poses
  • Sideview Graphics
  • Facesets (MV Style and Rm2k Style) + 4 Basic Emotions
  • Remastered RM2k Bust Art from the Original RTP

Please note: This pack is included in the RPG Maker MV Season Pass.

The 2nd pack includes some characters from RPG Maker 2000/2003 RTP completely remade for RPG Maker MV. Alex’s party is back to help you create your dream game!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Storage: 16.5 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display

name: RPG Maker MV - Add-on Vol.2: RM2K Hero Character Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: WindowsR 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit) or Mac OSR X 10.10 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 16.5 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50), iOS 8.0, Android 4.4.4*

short_description: The 2nd pack includes some characters from RPG Maker 2000/2003 RTP completely remade for RPG Maker MV!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Japanese
